Categorize this IT Ticket:

no space on disk sent wednesday october re creative renewal hello request below should probably be directed thanks analyst sent wednesday october re creative renewal hi beside license please investigate help with space more space partition thank you design lead en sent wednesday october re creative renewal hi seems like creative licence expired can you please renew urgent thanks sent monday re creative renewal hi yes still using creative if license expires need renewed thanks sent monday creative renewal dear could you please kindly confirm if you still using your creative licenses if you need them be renewed we preparing for renewals please only thanks for your understanding cooperation analyst
